post:
**vServer.site G2 KVM vServer**
Since a few weeks, we deploy our new G2 from KVM vServer. This hosted on Nodes, there are connected to multiple 10G to our Core Switches.

**General Functions**
KVM Full Virtualisation
Start, Stop, Reinstall over Control Panel
Rescue System
Add own ISO
1x IPv4 + /64 IPv6

**Datacenter**
Interwerk, Frankfurt / Main Germany

**Available Images**
Debian 8,9,10
CentOS 6,7
Ubuntu 16.04
Fedora, Suse...

**KVM Mini: 1 vCPU Core (Xeon @ 2,4 GhZ), 1 GB RAM, 5 GB HDD, 1Gbit/s Port, 1 TB Traffic inkl.**
Normal Price: € 1,50 per month - **with Discount € 1,20**
https://cp.vserver.site/cart.php?a=add&pid=19&promocode=20%SALE

**KVM Ultra: 2 vCPU Core (Xeon @ 2,4 GhZ), 2 GB RAM, 10 GB HDD, 1Gbit/s Port, 1 TB Traffic inkl.**
Normal Price: € 3,00 per month - **with Discount € 2,40**
https://cp.vserver.site/cart.php?a=add&pid=10&promocode=20%SALE

**KVM Large: 2 vCPU Core (Xeon @ 2,4 GhZ), 4 GB RAM, 20 GB HDD, 1Gbit/s Port, 1 TB Traffic inkl.**
Normal Price: € 5,99 per month - **with Discount € 4,79**
https://cp.vserver.site/cart.php?a=add&pid=7&promocode=20%SALE

See other Levels on our Website https://vserver.site/de/vserver2.html?utm_source=LET.
